mapper.select: select f_vpoint, f_hpoint, f_name, f_addr, f_hp , f_image1 from myjeju_food

select rno, fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_infor2, f_addr, f_vpoint, f_hpoint, f_hp, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from(select rownum rno, fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_infor2, f_addr, f_vpoint, f_hpoint, f_hp, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from(select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_infor2, f_addr, f_vpoint, f_hpoint, f_hp, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from myjeju_food order by f_like desc))

select rno, fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from (select rownum rno, fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from (select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from myjeju_food order by f_like desc) order by rno) where rno <=3
select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_infor2, f_addr, f_hp, f_like, f_file, f_sfile, star_avg, review_count from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid}
mapper.update: update myjeju_food set star_avg = ( select round(avg(f_star),1) from myjeju_food_review fr join myjeju_food f on(fr.fid = f.fid) where f.fid = (select fid from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid}) ) where fid = (select fid from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid})

update myjeju_food set review_count = ( select count(f_review) from myjeju_food_review fr join myjeju_food f on(fr.fid = f.fid) where f.fid = (select fid from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid}) ) where fid = (select fid from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid})
mapper.insert: delete from myjeju_f_heart where id=#{id} and fid=#{fid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from myjeju_f_heart where id=#{id} and fid=#{fid}
mapper.update: update myjeju_food set f_like = f_like+1 where fid=#{fid}
update myjeju_food set f_like = f_like-1 where fid=#{fid}
